sentences.sContent: His injury incapacitated him for playing basketball.
sentences.sCn: 他因受伤而不能打篮球了。

sentences.sContent: They ransacked the whole classroom for their basketball.
sentences.sCn: 他们翻遍了整个教室寻找他们的篮球。

phrases.pCn: n. 篮球选手；篮球球员

trans.tranOther: a game played indoors between two teams of five players, in which each team tries to win points by throwing a ball through a net
